questions.question: At which of these sites would you find the famous “Lion Gate”?
Which of the following is not considered a work of Minoan Art?
What technique of architecture did the Myceneans use to build the dome of the “Treasury of Atreus”?
The golden Vaphio cups, which are sometimes considered to be a creation of Minoan artists, has
Which sculptor created the chryselephantine scuplture of Athena in the Parthenon?
Which correctly lists the order of Greek pottery styles from earliest to latest?

options.A: Black figure, Corinthian Ware, Red Figure, White Ground
options.B: Geometric, Red Figure, Black Figure, White Ground
options.C: White Ground, Black figure, Red Figure, Geometric
options.D: Geometric, Black figure, Red Figure, White Ground

questions.question: Choose the letter that best describes a kouros statue of the 6th century BC.

options.A: Fully clothed, stylized hair, protruding eyes and a contrapposto pose
options.B: Left foot slightly advanced, nude, hands clenched at the side, archaic smile
options.C: Partially clothed, geometric musculature, arms posed in action, left foot advanced
options.D: Smooth and rounded features, nude, calm expression, tilted hips

options.A: Chariot race of Pelops and Oenomaus
options.C: The battle of Lapiths and Centaurs
